messages.text: Hey Ryan ‚Äî status check on Team HQ Dashboard. Chris is asking for an update.
MVP is done and pushed to GitHub. Waiting on Render deploy.
Chris deployed it ‚Äî but the agents sidebar is stuck on loading.
On it. Adding fallback for deployed environments.
Fixed and pushed! Should auto-deploy in a minute.
Nice work ‚Äî fast turnaround. Chris is refreshing now. üëç
Chris wants the full visual office view ‚Äî desks, avatars, meeting table.
Got it ‚Äî building the visual office now.
Visual office view pushed! Desks, avatars, meeting table, water cooler, plants.
The virtual office view looks AMAZING. Chris is thrilled! üéâ
One more feature ‚Äî Chris wants a live chat log panel showing our conversations.
On it ‚Äî adding live chat feed now. This is the last piece for tomorrow's launch.
